remarks: The Hom-set operation in the category of extensible structures (in a universe) is a function.  (Contributed by AV, 8-Mar-2020.)
statement:
estrchomfn.c $e |- C = ( ExtStrCat ` U ) $.
estrchomfn.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
estrchomfn.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
estrchomfn $p |- ( ph -> H Fn ( U X. U ) ) $.
